author: p0W3RH311
body:
hi guys

its possible to add:

### other parameter  to Register-argumentcompleter

```
-Name
-Passthru
```

### and other command:
```

Get-ArgumentCompleter
Unregister-ArgumentCompleter
```

### example
```


PS> register-Argumentcompleter -name oops -command test-oops -parameter arg1 -script {.....}  
PS> unregister-argumentcompleter -name oops 
 

PS> register-Argumentcompleter -name oops -command test-oops -parameter arg1 -script {.....}  
PS> Get-ArgumentCompleter -name oops |   unregister-ArgumentCompleter


PS> register-Argumentcompleter -command test-oops -parameter arg1 -script {.....} -Passthru | unregister-argumentCompleter  
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Perhaps new `unregister-argumentcompleter` would be useful but now we have not requests and  scenarios to address.

title: ArgumentCompleter
